EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited to the Honeywell Operators Conference in MN - Aug. 28-29
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE INVITATION Dear Customers/Partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the {{my.Event Name:default=edit me}}!
Date: {{my.Event Date:default=edit me}} Location: {{my.Event Location:default=edit me}}
{{my.Register here:default=edit me}} Value prop 1. (Why you should attend this event)
It's important to list out why customers should attend this event. What's in for them? Gather value added information from the event facilitator and list out the value prop in the simplest way. View agenda Value Prop 2.
What are the key takeaways for this event? Value Prop 3. {Guest speaker(s)?}
If you have a guest speaker(s) provide a brief bio and the highlight of their session. Please book your stay at Hilton Downtown MN by clicking on the link - Book your group rate for Honeywell <[[http://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%5EPRGAK%60HNGHNGA%60109%60EUR%60false%602%601/26/18%602/3/18%601/10/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>
Please contact Makiko Hultz <[[mailto:makiko.hultz@honeywell.com]]> for questions.
We look forward to meeting you in XYZ!
{{my.Event Manager:default=edit me}}
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201906_HOC_MN.html]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
